page.title: 21Local radio in Chapel-en-le-Frith
page.content:
High Peak Radio arrived in Chapel-en-le-Frith on 4th April 2004. From studios just off the High Street, it broadcasts to Chapel, Buxton, Glossop and the Hope Valley on 106.4 and 103.3 FM. Itâ€™s one of the smallest commercial radio stations in the UK, wholly locally-owned and managed. It broadcasts 24/7, with presenter-led programmes even through the night. Helen Mason and award-winning Leighton Morris have been on-air weekdays since Day1, backed by a dedicated team of news and sports journalists.
David Heathcote
